resources.string: Sorry, search failed, please check network settings.
Map centered on entered maidenhead/gridsquare coordinate.
Map centered on entered WhatThreeWords coordinate.

Repeater-START is an app for amateur radio.
When started, this app will try to update the latest repeaters from the hearham.com listing. If offline, the list will be loaded from storage. All repeaters in the lower half of the screen are listed by distance from the center of the map. 

 Tap a repeater to center its position on the topo map. 

 Tracking: Mapbox tracks number of active users and telemetry settings may be set through the (i) button at the bottom of the topo map. In the event of a crash some diagnostic data may be sent for debugging purposes through sentry.io.
